title: [2012.9.29][1.3.2] [必备] 【单机命令&PlayerAPI共存修复补丁 】
author: strawmaine
txt_content:
本帖最后由 strawmaine 于 2012-9-29 18:18 编辑 

SPC for PlayerAPI patch单机命令&PlayerAPI共存修复补丁  

本次更新文件：SPC_for_PlayerAPI_Patch_7.0_for_SPC_4.1.zip


使用方法：安装单机命令4.1、安装1.3.2的PlayerAPI、安装SPC_for_PlayerAPI_Patch_7.0_for_SPC_4.1.zip


本人在基础整合帖子内加了些网盘基础mod资源，最新SPC_for_PlayerAPI_Patch可以去那里（下面）下载
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-17958-1-1.html
也可以去官方发布页查看近况Single Player Commands for Player API - Minecraft Forum
